content.html: hi there! i’m a random weirdo who doesn’t follow you. just wanted to let you know that i misinterpreted your post in a bizarrely specific way and now i am fucking furious about some shit you didn’t say. could you spare 20 minutes or so for me to explain why this is your fault?
content.value:
hi there! i’m a random weirdo who doesn’t follow you. 

just wanted to let you know that i misinterpreted your post in a bizarrely specific way and now i am fucking furious about some shit you didn’t say.

could you spare 20 minutes or so for me to explain why this is your fault?
